title: The Herd Saturday Special Podcast: 08/04/2018
itunes:title: The Herd Saturday Special Podcast: 08/04/2018
description:
Colin talks with former NFL Scout and host of the "3 & Out" Podcast John Middlekauff about the potential dysfunction with the Raiders, the rookie QBs he's most excited about and if the 49ers are unhappy with Jimmy Garoppolo in this exclusive podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
